{{Infobox Berry |name = #55 Custap |image = [[File:Custap.png]] |caption = The flesh underneath the Custap Berry's tough skin is sweet and creamy soft. |growtime = 7h 36m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,700 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *40 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Custap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of sweet on the field. The [[Watmel]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 54 mins || 2 hours 18 mins || 3 hours 42 mins || 7 hours 36 mins - 15 hours 12 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CustapTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CustapTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
